nodes.excerpt: Here's a well curated list of 168 tech and industry providers for Shopify merchants, from all major categories, including SMS Marketing, Customer Service, Analytics, Financial tools, and much, much more. Steal the JPG here or click link for HQ PDF version.

nodes.excerpt: Most live video products are built for an adult-first corporate world not for kids and learning. Prisma LIVE is a new, fun and engaging way for kids to learn and collaborate together virtually.
nodes.title: Prisma LIVE - A live learning platform purpose-built for kids

nodes.excerpt: Collect your avatar from different parts. The code of this program is very easy, any developer will be able to understand the code. SVG is used to draw an avatar. Demo version of the project: https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
nodes.title: Avatar Maker - Create your own avatar

nodes.excerpt: Create simple shareable polls in seconds. Share your polls across all of your channels - newsletter, group text, Twitter, etc. No sign up required.
nodes.title: minipoll - Create simple shareable polls in seconds

nodes.excerpt: This is an on demand financial services marketplace. You can immediately connect with Finance, Accounting and Investing professionals. If you are a finance/accounting professional, you can connect with clients easily. Product Link: Doughflowclub.com
nodes.title: Dough Flow Club - Financial and accounting services marketplace

nodes.excerpt: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
nodes.title: Mobilo Wood - Smart business card made of wood

nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
nodes.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS

nodes.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
nodes.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions

nodes.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
nodes.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients

nodes.excerpt: Generate blob shapes: - Set Solid color - Set Gradient colors - Set a pattern background - Custom image clipping - Save and manage blobs locally - Sharable URL - Dark mode - Works offline and PWA support - Faster initial load and better performance - Blob change sound

nodes.title: Kintell - 1-to-1 video advice and tuition from vetted professionals

nodes.excerpt: Papercups EU is an open source live customer chat tool that is hosted in the EU for GDPR compliance purposes. We provide React/React Native/Flutter/HTML chat components for a ton of flexibility and customizability.
